content.description: Stand start with your hands on the almost vertical crack, move up to the horizontal crack seam, set your feet, and dyno your right hand to a triangle-shaped pocket. Match your hands, then move your left hand onto a small crimp sidepull to the left of the pocket. With high awkward foot holds, then do a big slap with your right hand to the lip, bump your right hand again higher up on the lip, get your right foot into the triangle pocket, move your left hand to a good hold, and pull the lip.
content.location:
To the right of

Barabbas

on the other side, look for a triangle pocket 2/3 the way up.

content.description: Sit start with your left hand on a good hold on the left side of the arete, your right hand on okay, sloping hold on the right side of the arete, your left foot on the left side of the arete, and your right foot on the right side of the arete. Pull up, and reach your right hand to the left side of the arete to a good hold, then match, move your right foot up slightly to the good edges, and move your right hand back to the starting hold. Then adjust your right foot to the ledge used for the stand start, and reach far with your right hand to a polished yet razor sharp micro edge. Bring your left foot from the left side of the arete to match with your right foot, then move to the sloping edge...you are now at the same position as the stand start.
content.location:
It is the sit start to

Barabbas

.

content.description: Stand start with your left hand on a hold on the other side of the arete, stand on the big ledge, and reach up with your right hand to a good, slopey hold. High step your left foot up close to your left hand, and your left hand then reaches to a big sloping ledge. Move your left foot over to the left side of the arete, and stand on the starting left hand hold, and match your right hand with your left hand. Then high step your right foot to the starting right hand hold. Reach up with your right hand to the sloping lip, match, and use small, angled, polished crimps to pull the lip.
content.location: Hike north from the parking lot to Holy Water Wall. Walk east along the base of the cliff till you are on the east side, You will pass some highball/hybrid potential lines. Keep going till the cliff comes to an end.
